#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<utility>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int tc;
    cin>>tc;
    while(tc--)
    {
        long long n,k,m;
        cin>>n>>k>>m;

        if(k==1)
        {
            cout<<n<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            while((n%k==0) && m)
            {
                n/=k;
                m--;
            }
            if(m%2!=0)
                cout<<n*k<<endl;
            else
                cout<<n<<endl;
        }
    }
}
